text.14_Daf, 0_Line, 0_Comment: This is the correct version: The dulfanin reproduce with people - if a person lies with one of them, they can produce offspring.
text.14_Daf, 0_Line, 1_Comment: Sons of the sea - there are fish in the sea that are half in the form of a man and half in the form of a fish. Sirene in old French.
